name: Red Eye vs The Undying Goo
name_original: Red Eye vs The Undying Goo
description:
Game by Austin Burt (twitter: lvlupaustin)

Music by Dustyn Astbury (soundcloud.com/dustynastbury)

This is my first ever game development project. Made it more or less as an accumulation of the things I had learned at the point I started it a couple months ago. This is a very short and simple game. I am taking donations for a new computer to work on for my new project. Dont feel bad to take it free though. Thanks!!!!!

-Austin
